info.official_title: A Phase I Study Assessing the Safety and Performance of SGM-101, a Fluorochrome-labeled Anti-carcino-embryonic Antigen Monoclonal Antibody for the Detection of Neoplastic Lesions in Patients With Colorectal Cancer or Pancreatic Cancer
